name: Intimidating Performance
prerequisiteFormula: any("ability to start a performance (or raging song) as a move action",@ability:bardic_performance,@ability:raging_song#skald)

description.text: Your performance strikes fear in the hearts of foes.

sections.Benefit: When you start a performance (or a raging song) as a move or swift action, you can use a standard action to demoralize a foe, attempting a Perform check appropriate to your performance in place of the Intimidate check. Your performance must be one with an audible component.
